c1.name: Dr. Carlos Méndez
c1.quote: I used to lose 5-6 calls daily. Now RecepcionistaAI attends them all and even schedules appointments. I recovered my investment in the first week.

c2.name: María González
c2.quote: My agents no longer waste time answering basic questions. The AI qualifies leads and only passes real interested ones to us.

q1.a: By choosing your plan, you have 7 full days to try the service. If you're not satisfied, you cancel before the period ends and nothing is charged.

q2.q: Do I need to change my phone number?
q2.a: No. You can keep your current number and redirect calls to RecepcionistaAI, or we can provide a new dedicated number.

q3.q: Does the AI sound like a robot?
q3.a: No. We use the most advanced voice technology available. Our customers report that their users don't notice the difference from a real person.

q4.q: What if the AI can't answer something?
q4.a: You can configure rules to transfer calls to a human in specific cases, or the AI can take a message and notify you immediately.

q5.a: We take care of the entire configuration. We just need your business information (schedules, services, prices) and we set up your personalized agent.

q6.q: Can I cancel at any time?
q6.a: Yes. There are no contracts or commitments. You can cancel your subscription at any time from your control panel.

q7.q: Does it work in my country?
q7.a: RecepcionistaAI works throughout Latin America, the United States and Spain. We support local numbers in multiple countries.
